Package me.tim

Class BoundingBox2D

java.lang.Object
me.tim.BoundingBox2D
public class BoundingBox2D extends Object
Save position data of literally anything that's two-dimensional.
Since:
Version 0.0.1
Author:
Tim

      xPos - Circle xPosition
      yPos - Circle yPosition
      diameter - Circle diameter (2 * radius)
